connection.name: Connection Name
connection.nameHelp: Descriptive name to identify this connection
connection.regionHelp: AWS region code where your DynamoDB tables are located
connection.endpointHelp: Custom endpoint URL. Leave empty to use official AWS
connection.accessKeyIdHelp: Your AWS Access Key ID (20 characters)
connection.secretAccessKeyHelp: Your AWS Secret Access Key (keep secret)
connection.sessionTokenHelp: Only needed if using temporary credentials
